text: What might be the reason that Julia through `OutOfMemoryError()` ? For same script, if my data has 524 rows then I get above error. But for some reason, If i filter the data which remain with only 64 rows, the script is running fine. I do not understand why this is happening. Is this my system's fault or something else?

? For same script, if my data has 524 rows then I get above error. But for some reason, If i filter the data which remain with only 64 rows, the script is running fine. I do not understand why this is happening. Is this my system's fault or something else?

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>

Without seeing  a MWE of what you are doing we cant diagnose the error but you might be allocating some  amount of memory proportional to the number of rows in your script and then you run out of memory
